dict.acceptation: 跳舞；舞会；舞蹈艺术；舞曲；
跳舞；手舞足蹈；摇晃；跳跃；

sent.orig: The verb "dance" is regular, but the verb "be" is not.
sent.trans: 动词dance的变化是规则的，但be的变化是不规则的。

sent.orig: Arabian dance Oriental Dance is women collective dance full of Arabian elegance.
sent.trans: 阿拉伯舞蹈东方舞是阿拉伯风情的女子群舞。

sent.orig: Dance Sport consists of 2 major fields: Standard Dance and Latin Dance.
sent.trans: 体育舞蹈分为标准舞和拉丁舞两大类。

sent.orig: In addition to Chinese dance, there are courses on Jazz, Tap Dance, Para-Para dance and Flamenco.
sent.trans: 而舞蹈方面，亦多元化了，除中国舞外，还增加了爵士舞？踢跶舞？排排舞及佛兰明高舞等等。

sent.orig: Joyful programmes include marching band, Latin dance, percussion, pop-song singers, samba music and dance and beats!
sent.trans: 节目包括步操管乐、标准舞及拉丁舞、敲击乐表演、南美音乐、流行歌手表演、森巴舞等动感呈献，实令你热血沸腾！
